The Portrait Glassred Drew

グラスレッド(グラスレッド)の(の)肖(しょう)像(ぞう)GURASUREDDO no shouzou

"If only you hadn't changed."
G

The story of Gumina reminiscing about her past with Sateriasis Venomania.

Lyrics

Versions

  • Original: The original version of the song uploaded to niconico and YouTube on January 31, 2015. It was later featured on Seven Crimes and Punishments.
  • Instrumental: An instrumental of the original linked from its niconico upload.

Albums

Notes

  • The PV was illustrated by Yuu and created by △○□×.
  • This song represents Lust in the Deadly Sins of Evil series as the response song to The Lunacy of Duke Venomania.
  • The niconico and YouTube uploads are described as "After everything was over, she looked back. While doing so, she painted that face which had been deluded by lust."
